Regulation Name(s): Device To Detect And Identify Nucleic Acid Targets In Respiratory Specimens From Microbial Agents That Cause The SARS-CoV-2 Respiratory Infection And Other Microbial Agents When In A Multi-Target Test
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for QIAstat-Dx Respiratory Panel Mini multiplex RT-PCR assay for qualitative detection of five respiratory viruses using nasopharyngeal swabs
Indications for Use Summary: Multiplexed nucleic acid test for qualitative detection and identification of Influenza A, Influenza B, Respiratory Syncytial Virus, Human Rhinovirus, and SARS-CoV-2 in nasopharyngeal swabs from individuals with signs and symptoms of respiratory infection, to aid in diagnosis in conjunction with other clinical findings.
